title: Gulliver's Theme Park family tickets are currently £39 instead of £84 but be quick
text:
Get the biggest Weekly Travel stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Families can bag a cheap day out for the school holidays next year thanks to a brand new deal on Gulliver's Theme Parks tickets.

That's because currently, Wowcher is offering family tickets to the attractions from £39 instead of £84 , which makes for a saving of 54 per cent.

For a family of four, that works out at just £9.75pp - not bad for an entire day out at a theme park.

You can already book the £39 tickets on Wowcher , but you'll need to do so by midnight on Monday 21st October when the deal expires.

The vouchers are valid for visits between the 1st March to the 31st August 2020; an ideal window of dates for families tied to school holidays, as it includes the Easter holidays, May half term, and even the summer holidays.

The vouchers are valid on one of three locations; Gulliver's World Warrington , Gulliver's Kingdom Matlock Bath or Gulliver's Land Milton Keynes . (You pick the location when you make the booking).

(Image: Gulliver's theme park)

Each theme park offers over 50 family-friendly rides, shows and attractions from gentle attractions aimed at younger kids, to thrilling rollercoasters for the older children and adults.

It's worth noting that although the deal is up for grabs this week, your voucher won't auto-redeem until the 31st January 2020.

It's actually a gift voucher too - so it could be the perfect present for Christmas if you're starting your shopping early.

One voucher is valid for a family of up to four people (which must include at least one adult and one child).

It's not just Gulliver's Theme Parks where you can find deals for 2020.

To give you a helping hand, we've put together guides for finding cheap tickets to the likes of Alton Towers , Drayton Manor , Legoland and Chessington World of Adventures .
description: Gulliver's Theme Park family tickets are currently going for £39 but you'll need to be quick to bag a deal
